segments.text: How we doing, you guys ready?
segments.speaker: Ross

segments.text: Mom already called this morning to remind me not to wear my hair up. Did you know my ears are not my best feature?
segments.speaker: Monica

segments.text: Some days it's all I can think about.
segments.speaker: Ross

segments.text: Hi, sorry I'm late, I couldn't find my bearings.
segments.speaker: Phoebe
